text: 'This review is retroactive to my experience at Hudson Table in January.\n\nI absolutely loved the Handmade Pasta class taught by Gene and his crew. The …'

text: 'Hudson table did an amazing virtual cooking event for Chilton Medical Center.  Our chef

author: Emily Nagel
text: 'Hosted my Mom’s surprise 60th here on Saturday with 20 close friends and family.  We did a hands on brunch class.  The food was delicious

author: Lauren Wennell
text: "Absolutely awesome experience. Heard about this place from a friend
column5: and it lived up to expectations! Great teachers
column6: and phenomenal recipes that are easy to follow at home (they give you a take home sheet). BYOB was nice
column7: as well. We went for date night and it was one of our favorites. We'll be back!"

author: Christine Thares
text: "We hosted an engagement party at Hudson Table on Feb 22
column8: and overall experience far exceeded my expectations.  Truly a special evening and made the hosts
column10: look like rock stars to our guests. A million thank you's to the Hudson Table owners and staff!"

author: Andrea Walker
text: "Really enjoyed coming here! We did a corporate event here with a small group. The staff is great fun
column7: and the kitchen is fantastic. They are really forthcoming with information

author: Steven Nickles
text: 'Had office party/cooking our meal party and it was great! The staff was friendly and professional! The place was clean & definitely returming.'

author: Travis Shaw
text: 'Went for a plated
column5: 4-course dinner.  The food was phenomenal!  You can talk to chef and make it as interactive as you desire.  BYOB.  Overall great meal and great value.  All courses were delicious and perfect amount of food.'
